Name: The Sych story
About the game: CAUTION! The english translate may be inaccurate, stupid and funny, because we translated the game with google translator. Think twice before buying. An unusual visual novel tells the story of the life of a nolifer and loser who is trying to change everything for the better. You can help him in this endeavor, because every choice affects the ending. The plot is saturated with humor, pleasant sound and unique art. Well, to the point?
